title: Florida Firm Recalls Beef, Chicken and Pork Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 21, 2015 Holiday Foods, a Hollywood, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,819 pounds of beef, chicken and pork products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products may contain...
